trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Humble
There were no other sightings in Humble on or around March 13th 1988
Summary: I sasw 2 objects one on top of another that were glowing, they stopped and started at same time'
divs: Sighting DetailsOn are around March 13,1988 I was praying in my yard in a suburban neighberhood called Fountainview.Iam 3miles north of Humble,Texas,17 miles south of Houston,tx, and 3miles northeast of IAH airport.Ive lived here since i was 7 years old,and before IAH was built,Ive seen almost every type of aircraft havind worked at the airport for many years.ive spent many a night watching the dirrerene planens copters, and blimps go by.But this was totally diferrent.I remember that i was praying for a sign yhat God was real for i was in somewhat of a spiritual point of distress with what was going on in my life and the Worlds.I looked up at about a45 degree angle to yhe east and i saw 2 bright glowing round objects movingslowly, one on top of another movind north to south.AT THAT COURSE IT WOULD BE MOVIND DIRECTLY TOWARDS HOUSTON.After about 5 seconds of looking ta these noiseless objects they frose in place at a distance of about 5 to 10 thousand feet.Then i saw a beam of bluish white light surround my yard including me,i went down to my kneesbecause i heard cleary inside my mind that this was Holy ground.It seemed tetepathic in nature.The light withdrew and the objectts continued at the same speed before they stopped,Theyed did not zoom off and disapear but i wathed them for another 3 or 4 minutes.I might add that because of the light pollution and smog ,you cannot see mant stars at night no matter how clear it is.I give my word and testimony with God as my witness that everything i wrote is true and i did not tell anybody for more than adecade about this,
